yayi shri lanka maha bankuwe sewaka arthasadhaka aramudal departhamenthuwe adhikarini kalyani gunathilaka mahathmiya "dinamina"ta prakasha kalaya.bankuwala kotashi mudal aayojanaya kirimata arthasadhaka aramudalata balayak ho sadacharathmaka ayithiyak ho nathayi atham ayaku nangana chodanawa bahara karamin shri lanka maha bankuwe arthasadhaka aramudal departhamenthuwe adhikarini kalyani gunathilaka mahathmiya ese kiwaya.arthasadhaka aramudale aayojana kalambaa pahadili kala gunathilaka mahathmiya, in siyayata 93k aayojanaya kara aththe rajya surakumpathwala bawa da pawasuwaya.sewaka arthasadhaka aramudal aayojana kamituwa, sewaka arthasadhaka aramudal departhamenthuwa, banku adhikshana departhamenthuwen sampurnayenma wenwu swadhina anshayak bawada oo kiwaya.thama aramudala aayojana pilibanda siyaluma margopadeshana laba denuye mudal mandalaya wisin bawada, eewa pilibandawa samuhika aayojana thirana ganimata aayojana kamituwata balaya athayida gunathilaka mahathmiya pahadili kalaya..
